delay

public static void delay(long lMilliSeconds)
Wait a specified time. The routine uses Thread.sleep so below 20 ms timing becomes very erraneous, but works fine for longer times

Parameters:
lMilliSeconds - number of milliseconds to wait

init

public static boolean init()
Initialize. Before calling the emulated IO routines, use one of the init routines to set the host name and port number of the server emulating the HW.
